title: What do you look for when choosing a hotel?

korean: 호텔 선택할 때 몇 가지 중요하게 보는 게 있어.
대중교통 가까운 곳이나 관광지 근처가 좋아.
예산 안에서 최대한 좋은 곳을 찾으려고 해.
가성비를 따지는 편이라 리뷰를 꼭 확인해.
다른 사람들의 솔직한 후기가 정말 도움이 돼.
일정이 바뀔 수 있으니까 무료 취소 가능한 게 좋아.
english: There are a few things I consider important when choosing a hotel.
First of all, location is most important.
I like places close to public transportation or near tourist spots.
It should be easy to walk around to make traveling convenient.
I try to find the best place within my budget.
I'm the type who considers cost-effectiveness, so I definitely check reviews.
Other people's honest reviews are really helpful.
I also consider cleanliness very important.
I check the room condition through photos too.
I tend to check whether breakfast is included.
Lastly, I definitely check the cancellation policy.
Since schedules can change, free cancellation is good.
